name: Roten Steel
description:
Roten Steel is an arcade game where swords are (finally!) used as a ranged weapon.

As an undead knight, your living swords are still tethered to you even in death. Wield them carefully and make sure to keep them connected while you eviscerate your foes and cleanse the world from the evil that cursed you this way to begin with. 

This was made in 48 hours for GMTK 2021 game jam with the theme "Joined Together". We hope you have fun chasing high scores, and feel free to let your opinion be known with a review!
